On Sa= t, 17 Jan 2026 at 21:03, <team@contact.senthil.world> wrote:
=20 =20 =20 =20 =20

Request for Proposal

=20

Hello,

We are requesting a proposal for the following procurement:

=20

Items Required

  • laptop
    Quantity: 20 | Specifications: 16GB RAM=20
  • monitor
    Quantity: 15 | Specifications: 27-inch=20
=20

Budget: = map[amount:%!s(float64=3D50000) currency:USD]

=20

Delivery Timeli= ne: 30 days

=20

Payment Terms:<= /span> net 30

=20

How to Respond

Please reply to this email with your proposal including:

  • Total pricing (itemized if possible)
  • Delivery timeline
  • Warranty details
  • Any additional terms or conditions
=20

Thank you for your consi= deration,

Procurement Team
